page.title: 07Streets:Leftwich & Hartford
page.content: We surveyed and compared housing in School Lane,Hartford and Old Hall, Leftwich. Houses in Hartford were much older than Leftwich, being over 40 years old. Houses in Leftwich seemed to change hands much more often. The reason for moving house in both areas were mainly to do with wanting a bigger house or getting another job. Many people in Leftwich rented their house but only two householders did so in Hartford. In Hartford the houses were generally detached, bigger and with larger gardens. In Leftwich they were mainly semi-detached or terraced. Few houses in Leftwich had garages, unlike Hartford where several had double garages. Both areas had plenty of greenery - trees, verges and open fields close by.
